<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_58872_needit.MEBS Test</api_name><description>what do we need to do to make this appear in UIB</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>MEBS Test</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
    "name":"userFullName",
    "label":"User full name",
    "description":"",
    "readOnly":"false",
    "fieldType":"string",
    "mandatory":true,
    "defaultValue":""
}
]</props><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "User full name",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {

    // Concatenate the user name from the Data Resource Configuration
    // with a string
    var newString = input.userFullName + "'s Next NeedIt";
    return newString;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-28 17:34:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>700872ce1b510510b81fdce7cc4bcb2d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MEBS Test</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_700872ce1b510510b81fdce7cc4bcb2d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-28 17:34:18</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=700872ce1b510510b81fdce7cc4bcb2d"/></record_update>
